import React from "react"; /** * Title: Explaining Game Types */ export let HelpText =

The site has 3 types of games:

  1. Standard: Regular Chess. Chess is played by millions of people all over the world.
  2. Custom: Use pieces that you created in your game. You created a piece by deciding how it moves and what it looks like, now decide how itâ€™s going to be included in your game. See the Custom option or Create Piece page for more information.
  3. Council:A modification of Chess where it is possible to have multiple Kings. See the Council Rules page for more information.

Note: At dating of writing the Council option hasn't been implemented. Remove this notice when Council is fully implemented.
